Welcome to the official /mlp/ Secret Santa 2022 thread! Tell Santa all your wildest wishes and come join us in sending cards, gifts, and cheer to your fellow Pony lovers!
Sign-ups are closed and gift assignments are out. Card assignments are ongoing, Wooooooo!
CHECK IN TO THE THREAD. Make sure to check your emails and check into the thread so that your Santa knows that you’re alive and can ask you questions.

>How’s this thing work?
Read the FAQ!
The short form:
Gifts are given Round Robin Circle Jerk style (A gives to B gives to C who gives to A) while cards are exchanged traditionally (whomever you give a card to should send one back to you). You will be randomly assigned anons by email after the signups are over so please keep an eye out!

Latecomers: Kiwi is looking at opening the 2022 Latecomers on November the 23rd at 5pm CST! Signups will end on November the 30th at 11:59pm CST

Nov the past: Gift assignments out.
Nov the soon: Card assignments ongoing!
Dec 1st - 10th: The latest suggested mailing period. Consider mailing on the early side if you’re shipping internationally.

Coordinator email for comments/concerns/general inquiries: MLPSecretSanta2022@gmail.com
Card Ambassador and milf mare connoisseur: thecardslut@gmail.com
Kiwi: Resident corpse, international correspondent, and expert in dealing with people who don't understand deadlines. kiwilatecomers@gmail.com

>WHERE’S MY SANTEE/SANTA?!
I’m so sorry, but they were eaten by a grue.
CHECK IN YOU GOOBERS!

>BUT IT’S NOT EVEN THANKSMAS YET! REEEEE!
Less than a week away! Do not wait! Start crafting and ordering so you can get those gifts out in time for Horsemas! Don’t be late! Panic! PAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANIC! threads.com:
This will be deleted so it'll be quick. Today's an exceptionally special day as it marks 10 years since Milky Way's Tumblr started. The tumblr is now age-restricted but you can view the posts here starting from the back: https://www.tumbex.com/milkmare-of-trottingham.tumblr/posts?page=10

Milky's special talent quickly gained the blog over 1400 watchers in less than two weeks. It was especially embraced on /mlp/ where the thread generated several times more content than the tumblr which was only in its second day: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/5678650/#q5678650 Milky had a continuous presence for months afterwards as a general thread.

Fast forward to May 2013 and it was on its 71st general thread: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/10866090/#q10866090 The thread was deleted early and the incident shrugged off, but unbeknownst to them it was right before some of the most eventful days in /mlp/ history. Lauren Faust would visit /mlp/ a few days later https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/ and all hell broke loose, even prompting a reply from Moot (https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/500/3/#q10906860). But attention quickly turned to "The Scruffening", a mass deletion of various threads and general confusion over the following days. Milky Way threads were quickly deleted from then on, later confirmed as bannable content due to its NSFW nature: https://desuarchive.org/q/thread/640332/#q641855 Some claimed that Lauren's visit sparked the sudden SFW enforcement but this remains inconclusive.

Milky Way threads have occasionally been posted over the years, lasting only a few minutes to several hours at a time. While the blog's creator remains active (https://twitter.com/FlashEquestria), the blog itself hasn't had a new post in a year.

Not expecting a discussion here. This one's for the archives.

Welcome to the Pony Voice Preservation Project!
youtu.be/730zGRwbQuE

The Pony Preservation Project is a collaborative effort by /mlp/ to build and curate pony datasets for as many applications in AI as possible.

Technology has progressed such that a trained neural network can generate convincing voice clips, drawings and text for any person or character using existing audio recordings, artwork and fanfics as a reference. As you can surely imagine, AI pony voices, drawings and text have endless applications for pony content creation.

AI is incredibly versatile, basically anything that can be boiled down to a simple dataset can be used for training to create more of it. AI-generated images, fanfics, wAIfu chatbots and even animation are possible, and are being worked on here.

Any anon is free to join, and there are many active tasks that would suit any level of technical expertise. If you’re interested in helping out, take a look at the quick start guide linked below and ask in the thread for any further detail you need.

EQG and G5 are not welcome.

>Quick start guide:
derpy.me/FDnSk
Introduction to the PPP, links to text-to-speech tools, and how (You) can help with active tasks.

last_replies.com:
>>39324798
>"He simply threw the Great and Tasty cupcakes on the ground and started destroying them in a goose-like way! So rude! After Miss Shy knocked me over, she helped the goose! Ugh, can you believe it?” said Trixie, pointing a hoof at the defendant, who slouched into her chair in response.
The courtroom had become very tense at the accusations. Anon wondered if each pony present believed or disbelieved the testimony. Looking around, he had a hard time telling. Trixie was known to exaggerate, but on the other hand she had given the sacred courtroom oath. 'She dare not violate such a sacred oath. She must at least believe what she says is true.' Anon concluded.
>"No further questions, your judgeness."
>Judge Fluttershy signaled Miss Defender to begin.
>Miss Defender, though shaky, began her line of questioning with vigor this time.
>"Miss Great, while you were knocked down, how close were you to the cupcake massacre?"
>"Close enough that frosting was landing on me. It was dreadful!" responded Trixie with a disgusted tone.
>"And could you clearly see the goose?" asked Miss Defender, shutting her eyes tight as she caught the glance of a yellow mare in the audience.
>"Well I...well, sort of." Trixie admitted.
>"Um...what do you mean by sort of, if you please?" probed Miss Defender.
>"I could see part of the goose through Miss Shy's legs." sighed Trixie.
>"So...um...well...would you say that Miss Shy's Great and Powerful rump obstructed your line of sight?"
>"Objection, it hasn't been established that Miss Shy's rump is, in fact, Great and Powerful. Only Trixie's...um...rump is known to the court to be Great and Powerful. Also, leading the witness." said Prosecuter X in whispery anger, her fiery earrings dancing about in fury.
>Trixie nodded in agreement. Her rump had indeed been registered with the court as great and powerful.
>Judge Fluttershy's eyes opened wide at the outburst. "Well...I...um...sustained on the,...on the rump part. But, overruled on the leading."
At this exchange Anon looked over to Miss Shy at the defendant's table. She glanced at her rump, graced by butterflies as it was, and adopted a somewhat dejected look. 'Poor thing. If not Great and Powerful, her rump is certainly scrumptious, maybe even the most scrumptious rump I've seen.' Anon thought.
>Miss Defender re-asked her question, without using 'Great and Powerful'.
>Trixie sighed, then answered. "No, I couldn't see around Miss Shy's rump."
>"What did you hear while this was happening, if you please?"
>"I couldn't hear what Fluttershy was saying if THAT'S what you mean. The 'HONKING' was dreadfully loud." said Trixie with a sarcastic tone.
>Another bang of the gavel. "No, sarcasm from the witness please." said Judge Fluttershy while giving Trixie the stink-eye again.
>"No more questions your lawfulness, if that's fine." said Miss Defender.
>"Oh, ok...you're dismissed Miss Great and Powerful.”
>Trixie rolled her eyes and disappeared in a poof of smoke.

>Spitfire flutters her eyelids.

>She stifles a giggle at your stammering before zipping away.

>The remainder of the morning passes without further incident, thank Best Princess.
>Spitfire releases the 'bolts early for lunch at a quarter to noon, you included.
>It's only now that you realize you'd forgotten to pack your lunch in your haste to leave Windy's house this morning.
>The bitter feeling in your gut may have suppressed your appetite enough to forget about breakfast, but it's fading fast.
>Trudging back towards the main building, you weigh your options.
>Sure, you're welcome to eat in the chow hall with the flyers, but you'd prefer not to- socializing is one of the last things you care to do today.
>You've got plenty of time swing back by the house and grab something to eat, though you're not ready to face Windy yet.
>Picking up something in town is also an option, but it would be wise to save your bits, especially since you've got another two weeks of unpaid work to complete.
>Looks like you're going to fast until dinner.
>"Pssst..."

>You shut your locker and look around.
>Must've been your imag-
>"Pssst! Anon!"
>Pivoting on your foot, you find... nothing.
>The hall is still deserted, save for you.
>With a sigh, you spin back towards your locker, only to find a mare blocking your view of it.
>A very pretty, very familiar mare whose smile seems to brighten the entire hallway.
"Ah, shit!" you stumble backwards and fall on your ass. "Windy! What are you doing here?"
>The mare smiles wider and helps you to your feet.
>So much for avoiding her.

>"Look at you! Going to work before anypony else! I'm sure you're making such a good impression with everypony here!"
>Her smile diminishes, and she flutters up to rest her front hooves on your shoulders.
>"But Anon, sweetie... you gotta make sure to not overdo it, okay? You need to make sure you're taking care of yourself too!"
"Good thing I've got you." you say without thinking.
>Windy looks away- her hoof can't quite cover her sheepish smile.

threads.com:
>What is this?
an ARG about pony fandom history and a mysterious mare that's been with us through it all.
Tolerance, or Tolly for short, is a mysterious internet mare that has been watching and documenting the fandom since its beginning.
She's been around since October 2010, but hasn't been able to talk to us until this February.
Tolly posts pictures to the board with the caption "I felt too happy, so I made this"
Her pictures appear on a website, https://withtolerance.horse, and lead to various puzzles which in turn lead to journal entries of hers that she means to keep private.
She set up a way to communicate with us directly at https://withtolerance.horse/friendshipthroughtheages. Send her a message and decode her response with https://www.boxentriq.com/code-breaking/hex-analysis or with this userscript https://u.smutty.horse/mfzuqpfndow.js
Tolly is excited to finally be able to talk to us, but she's dying, and she doesn't have much time left.

>How can I get caught up?
Installing the userscript and reading through a handful of the early responses (and a few of the latest ones) on https://withtolerance.horse/friendshipthroughtheages might be the best way to get caught up with the narrative side of things, for a lot of the puzzles you should be fine to just jump right in. They're generally pretty self-contained.

>What is Flutterrape?
Flutterrape is a collection of stories about ponies trying and failing to have sex with Anon, the only human in Equestria. While the title implies that it is Fluttershy trying to rape Anon, others may follow in her stead and attempt their own versions of rape. There are different versions of Flutterrape, but most are light-hearted comedies about the ponies failing in their attempts to get into Anon’s pants. Just because your story has Anon in it, doesn't mean it fits in this thread. Check other threads (AiE, RGRE etc) about story content before posting.

>It's been 10 years, how is this thread still alive?
A perverse mixture of necromancy and spite.

This is the general thread for the alternative fan sites of the My Little Pony fandom. Discussion, development suggestions, and criticisms are all welcome here.

>Why alternate boorus?
Recent changes to Derpibooru have made the site a less than ideal location for pony fan art. So, several new boorus have arisen to provide alternatives. Many of the altbooru owners post in thread and listen to questions and comments from anons. Note that this is NOT the Derpibooru drama general. Please keep posts about Derpibooru in the thread on mlpg.co.

>Why alternate text sites?
Pastebin.com has deleted, and continues to delete, greentexts on the site. FimFiction does not allow stories in the greentext format, so a new home is needed.

Assuming the internet continues to exist, I think there will always be a trickle of new MLP fans. The official and fandom content are just that good to continue drawing new people.

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>39324503
It will always remain a trickle from here-on out just because people are naturally more drawn to something if it has a large and/or active social group to enjoy it with, regardless of the original show/movie/etc... quality. We had this from about 2011-2015, but after that it calmed down and the trickle began of people moving on to other things and small amounts of new people getting on the bandwagon late.
Unless Hasbro pulls off a miracle with G5 and fixes their shit, they wont get much increased interest in MLP like G4 facilitated. As has been said before, it was lightning in a bottle, and it would be very difficult to recreate the conditions to cause a popularity explosion we had initially.

It is a bittersweet situation, where you can spend time here with people that still continue to enjoy the show and the content made from it with one another, but at the same time you don't see often new people to share it with that have any genuine interest. I don't know what the next 20 years holds, but I am fairly certain that even if I have to eventually box up and store away my merch and focus less and less on pony, I will still end up habitually coming back at least to this board and occasionally re-watch bits of show and fan content - especially the anniversary streams.

This show has no god damn right to have been held as fondly as it is in my heart, but it got there, and I don't think its going away.

What is a 'Satyr Abomination' thread about?
A satyr is what happens when a human and a pony decide to get freaky and end up having a child. The top half is mostly human, the bottom is from pony mom (or pony dad). This thread is dedicated to the art and written works about these lovable creatures.
>What about other species?
The show had quite a few different intelligent species by season 8, 'everycreature' and all. Pick your poison, but /mlp/ is mainly into ponies.

threads.com:
This is a thread dedicated to the preservation and archival of pony content, from YouTube and other sites.

>Where can I find deleted pony stuff?
In general:
https://www.theponyarchive.com/
https://warp.theponyarchive.com/ (TPA file search)
https://hobune.stream/tpa-h/channels/ (user-friendly TPA frontend)

Specific YouTube videos by ID:
https://hobune.stream/tpa-h/videos/VIDEOID
https://tpa.mares.workers.dev/?id=VIDEOID&output=html
https://web.archive.org/web/*/http://wayback-fakeurl.archive.org/yt/VIDEOID

If you can't find something, ask in the thread - many anons have private archives. When requesting YouTube content, include the video id, channel name, and/or video title if possible.

>How do I archive stuff?
yt-dlp: https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp#installation
Supports downloading from YouTube and a fuckload of other sites.
Make sure to use flags that properly save additional metadata (thumbnail, description, .info.json etc).
This is the config I use: https://github.com/rebane2001/sensible-yt-dlp-archive-scripts
yt-dlp also has many GUI frontends available in case the terminal is too scary for you.
Tube Archivist: https://github.com/tubearchivist/tubearchivist
A user-friendly self-hostable website for archiving videos. I have not used it myself so I don't know if it is any good, but I've heard good things about it.

You can also link content to be archived in the thread if you'd like other anons to take care of it.

>Useful resources
Everything: https://www.voidtools.com/
Windows program for searching all of your files instantly.

Feel free to suggest resources and other information to include in the next OP.
